General.Name: Geron Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuchan Zhongda Geron Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells textile carding equipment in China. The company was formerly known as Geron Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Wuchan Zhongda Geron Co.,Ltd. in July 2022. Wuchan Zhongda Geron Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Nantong, China.
